author: SteveL-MSFT
body: Added some issue #s for open issues.  Removed some rows from the table that have been fixed.

comments.author: joeyaiello
comments.body: Your changes LGTM. Do we plan on making changes to the cmdlet table too?

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @joeyaiello I made some changes in the table, although the diff doesn't make it clear since it's treating the table as one entity.  Update-Help was removed as it works now.  I'll do a separate PR once I identify which cmdlet sets in the table have open issues and which don't.

title: Update KNOWNISSUES.md
